text: Thomas Welpley (c. 1483 – 1534 or later), of Bath, Somerset, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Bath in 1529. He was Mayor of Bath in 1530. ==References== Category:1480s births Category:16th-century deaths Category:English MPs 1529–1536 Category:Mayors of Bath, Somerset
title: Thomas Welpley
